scripts.sass-watch: npm run sass && node-sass --source-map-embed --watch styles/styles.scss -o css
scripts.lint: stylelint styles/config.scss styles/footer.scss styles/grid.scss styles/main.scss styles/myndbond.scss styles/styles.scss styles/video.scss
scripts.install: npm install --save-dev node babel browser-sync concurrently eslint node-sass rollup stylelint stylelint-config-sass-guidelines stylelint-config-standard eslint-config-airbnb eslint-plugin-import
scripts.test: npm run esLint && npm run lint
